explanations.machine learning: The abstract mentions the high presence of machine learning (ML) in the use of big data analytics and artificial intelligence during Covid-19.
explanations.deep learning: Deep learning is a subset of machine learning and is implied by the mention of AI and ML applications in the context of big data analytics.
explanations.neural network: Neural networks are a fundamental component of many machine learning and deep learning models, which are discussed in the context of AI applications for Covid-19.
